name: Qinghua Hu
content: Qinghua Hu Qinghua Hu (è¡æ¸ å), Professor College of Intelligence and Computing, Tianjin University, China Dean of the School of Artificial Intelligence Director, Tianjin Key Lab of Machine Learning Service Honors Fund Publications Home Qinghua Hu is Dean of School of Artificial Intelligence, the Vice Chairman of Tianjin Branch of China Computer Federation, the Vice Directior of SIG Granular Computing and Knowledge Discovery, Chinese Association of Artificial Intelligence. He is Associate Editor of IEEE Transactions on Fuzzy Systemsï¼ACTA AUTOMATICA SINICAï¼Engergies . He now is supported by Key Program, National Natural Science Foundation of China. His research is focused on uncertainty modeling in big data, machine learning with multi-modality data, intelligent unmanned systems. He has published more than 200 peer-reviewed papers.
